resources.string: This services disables and enables grayscale mode depending on which app is currently open. It also reacts to long-pressing the home button and manages detoxing mode pauses.
DetoxDroid needs specific permissions for this feature to work.
Make \"Do Not Disturb\" your new default.
DetoxDroid will support you in winding down your smartphone use and curb with your smartphone addiction.
DetoxDroid automatically (re-)activates the do not disturb mode. Exceptions can be made with the system settings.
Color up by coloring down your phone
Strip away all the neuron-stimulating colors (hint: you can add your camera and gallery app to the exceptions).
Take a break from taking a break

DetoxDroid can be paused for a defined period of time, for example if you want to take a quick look on a photo somebody sent you. It will automatically come back into life, once the pause is over. A pause can be made by pressing the quick settings tile or by long-pressing the home button.
DetoxDroid is open-source and without ads. If you find the app useful, please consider leaving a donation to support the development of the app.
You need to grant this app elevated privileges from your computer.\n\n Please visit https://detoxdroid.flx-apps.com/ to find out how.
